titleStmt.title: The tryal between Henry Duke of Norfolk, plaintiff, and John Jermaine defendant in an action of trespass on the case at the court of Kings-Bench at Westminster, on the 24th of November, 1692.
titleStmt.author: Norfolk, Henry Howard, Duke of, 1655-1701, plaintiff.
Germain, John, Sir, 1650-1718, defendant.
England and Wales. Court of King's Bench.

notesStmt.note: "The plaintiff sets forth, that ... the defendant did, by unlawful ways and means, entice away his duchess ... and by lascivious conversation, committed adultery with her"--p. 3.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
